description:
We follow the family as we find out that Mom was raised in a small fishing village in Kochi, Fumi works her manipulative ways to get what she wants at times but ruins her new dress in the next short, and finally Dad, who works as a cameraman, one day returns home and sees Bunji who he hasn’t seen in a long time.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Grandpa / It`s a fact / I love you / Slam
じいちゃん / 基本です / しゅき / ばっしん
